channel.title: Need help on writing on top of screen
channel.description: When playing this server, i want it to say at the top left corner, "black marks = 0" and i can change those marks for each player to wtvr i want. And under that i would like to have "Player Rep = 0" (Only i can change those too), so anyhelp?

item.title: Need help on writing on top of screen
item.dc:creator: @masterp00n masterp00n
item.description:
@masterp00n wrote:

just do this
change this

    public void writePlayers() {
    int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
    sendFrame126("@whi@                 ~~~@red@Ownz Youz Pkz@whi@~~~", 6570);
    sendFrame126("@gre@Black marks:  " + Blackmarks, 6572);
    sendFrame126("@blu@  Rep: " +Reputaion, 6664);
    setInterfaceWalkable(6673);
  }

to this

public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("@whi@ ~~~@red@Ownz Youz Pkz@whi@~~~", 6570); sendFrame126("@blu@ Rep: " +Reputaion, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6671); }dunno if thats it

Read full topic
